text: heliri; (devatvadallina) nim'ma paludarara paiki, satyadedege margadarsana maduvavaru yaradaru iddareye? Heliri; allahane satyadedege margadarsana maduttane. Anusaranege heccu ar'hanu, satyadedege margadarsana maduvavano athava yaradaru tanage saridari toradiddare svatah saridariyannu kanalagadavano? Nimagenagide? Nivu adentaha nirdharagalannnu kaigolluttiruviri
